subject: Economy
question_en: What is MGNREGS? What is its significance?
question_hi: MGNREGS ka matlab kya hai aur iske parichay kaise pahuncha sakte hai?
A_en: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
A_hi: मैंग एनएरियाई और संविधान और आधारित मैंग
B_hi: राज्यों के लिए नेतृत्व और मानना
explanation_en:
MGNREGS stands for National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme. It is a flagship scheme of the Indian government aimed at providing minimum 100 days of employment to rural households in unemployed rural areas. The scheme was launched in 2005 and has had a significant impact on reducing rural poverty and stimulating economic growth.

राज्यों के लिए नेतृत्व और मानना
explanation_hi: MGNREGS इस भारतीय राज्यों के लिए नेतृत्व और मानना
explanation_en: MGNREGS stands for National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme. It is a flagship scheme of the Indian government aimed at providing minimum 100 days of employment to rural households in unemployed rural areas. The scheme was launched in 2005 and has had a significant impact on reducing rural poverty and stimulating economic growth.
